hero.title: EchoNote
hero.headline: From Voice to Action, Locally
hero.description: A local-first desktop app for voice transcription, real-time recording, and calendar-aware timeline workflows.
hero.subtitle: Open Source • Free • Cross-Platform

features.title: Key Features
features.subtitle: Discover how EchoNote streamlines transcription, scheduling, and timeline context in one workflow.
features.callToAction: Want to learn more about the technical details?

batchTranscription.title: Batch Transcription
batchTranscription.description: Transcribe audio and video files with local models and export in multiple formats.

realtimeRecording.title: Real-time Recording
realtimeRecording.description: Capture microphone audio, annotate key moments, and generate live transcripts.

calendarIntegration.title: Calendar Integration
calendarIntegration.description: Connect Google or Outlook calendars and keep events synced with recordings.

timelineIntelligence.title: Timeline Intelligence
timelineIntelligence.description: Correlate events, recordings, and transcripts in one searchable timeline.

privacyFirst.title: Privacy First
privacyFirst.description: Keep data local with encrypted storage and no mandatory cloud dependency.

multilingualWorkflow.title: Multilingual Workflow
multilingualWorkflow.description: Supports multilingual speech recognition with a translation-ready UI architecture.

howItWorks.title: How EchoNote Works
howItWorks.subtitle: A practical workflow designed for privacy, speed, and reliable output.

capture.title: Record & Capture
capture.description: Start a meeting or import audio. EchoNote captures high-fidelity input and aligns it with your event timeline.

transcribe.title: Transcribe Locally
transcribe.description: Local AI models convert speech to text securely on your machine. Your audio does not leave the device by default.

organize.title: Organize & Search
organize.description: Review transcripts, generate summaries, and search across your entire timeline of meetings and notes.

github.title: Project Statistics
github.subtitle: View live repository data and community activity for EchoNote on GitHub.
